hypothesis_content.title: Bull-to-Stress Transition Signal via Solana Futures Funding Spike
hypothesis_content.statement: When SOL perpetual swap funding rates on major exchanges (Binance, Bybit) exceed +0.15% per 8hr (annualized > 150%) while SOL's price is at a 30-day high AND BTC's 10-day realized volatility drops below 40%, it signals an overheated bull segment likely to trigger a sharp correction and transition to STRESS regime within 3-7 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extreme positive funding in a major alt during low BTC volatility indicates excessive leverage and complacency. This creates fragility where a minor catalyst can trigger cascading long liquidations, spreading to other alts and flipping regime to STRESS. SOL is a key sentiment proxy for altcoin leverage.
entry_conditions: SOL funding rate > +0.15% per 8hr for 2 consecutive periods
Aggregate crypto futures open interest at 30-day high

exit_conditions.take_profit: 8% drop in SOL price from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: SOL price makes new high after entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: SOL continues rallying >10% beyond signal without a >5% drawdown, or regime remains BULL for >10 days post-signal.
